import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import TextArea from '../../components/textArea' export default function EditPostModal({ forumId, threadId, setThread, post, open, setOpen }) { const [content, setContent] = useState(post.content) const [error, setError] = useState(null); const handleSubmit = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault() if (content !== '') { editPost() setOpen(false) alert("Successfully edited thread.") } } function editPost() { post.content = content axios .put(`http://localhost:8080/IS3106Assignment1-war/webresources/forums/${forumId}/threads/${threadId}/posts`, post) .then((response) => { setThread(response.data) }) .catch(error => setError(error)) } return (
{/* This element is to trick the browser into centering the modal contents. */} {/* ​ */}
